website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a waterbed mattress that's gently wavy and supportive, this one is worth a look.
pros: Provides a nice combination of mild, relaxing waves and comfortable structure thanks to the wave reduction and mid-body support systems
Not too difficult to set up
cons: Sheets have the tendency to come untucked and slip out of place with movement

customer_reviews.title: Warranty
customer_reviews.text: This is my second water bad by this company.For the price ,you just can not beat it.If you read the warranty you will find that the bed is covered for the first three years.100% After three years you would be looking at 60% payment at the retail price. Hard to believe but the old one gave out at three years and two months. The corner seam gave out.You can NOT patch the corner seam. Other than that I love the bed.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! We love it!
customer_reviews.text: Never would of believed what a semi waveless matress could be like. Its so much firmer then our old bladder. Back feels even better. Great quality, thick material.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable mattress I have owned by far
customer_reviews.text: I have never been able to find a mattress that supports my lower back. Was thinking water might be the only option for my body type and I think I was right. Most comfortable mattress I have owned by far, nothing comes close. It's so good I have trouble leaving it in the morning. The only downside is the unavoidable smell of vinyl, but I used to work at a pool company so it doesn't me that much.
customer_reviews.author: jack murray

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this mattress by other reviews! We absolutely love this mattress! It hardly moves at all! So very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lowden

customer_reviews.title: I love my new water mattress
customer_reviews.text: I love my new water mattress. It is very comfortable and is much better than a "normal" waterbed mattress which moves around too much. Very happy with my purchase. Good price and value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Teresita Pines

customer_reviews.title: Came in a timely manner and was easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Came in a timely manner and was easy to set up. As a waterbed user for over 40 years I am extremely happy with this product so far.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rosebure

customer_reviews.title: Works really well.
customer_reviews.text: The mattress is great except for the smell of the vinyl.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'd give it ten stars if I could !!!
customer_reviews.text: Best night sleep I've had in a along Time ! I wish I hadn"t been so cheap and bought the 800 series though !
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J. Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress great price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing mattress for the price. Just the right amount of wave. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy A Hartwig

customer_reviews.title: Waveless confort
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed with this mattress, it is the most waveless one I have owned and the most comfortable. Excellent back support.
customer_reviews.author: Robert McNish

customer_reviews.title: so good! This mattress has very good support
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! This mattress has very good support. I received it earlier than I expected, and it was just as it was described. I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great nights sleep
customer_reviews.text: Provides a great nights sleep. Easy setup, good packaging. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not a “semi waveless” mattress!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give negative stars I would! This is NOT a “SEMI WAVELESS” waterbed. This is a full on old school water mattress! It feels like you are laying on a pool floaty in a pool! If you like that feeling then this is a great mattress. If you lay still and don’t move your fine. Also the photo shows different layers of foam there is only one layer of foam with “wire” or “strings” holding the top and bottom liners together. Save your money and “DONT BUY THIS MATTRESS!” You will be vary disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: Larry A Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Wanted waveless - this is NOT it
customer_reviews.text: Not waveless enough! Sheets become 'untucked' too easily. I wake up every time my spouse enters or leaves the bed. This can't be determined until the mattress is filled & used. Too late & too cumbersome to empty & return. Even if we received our money back, we'll never see the refund on all the water we used to fill the mattress.. Never had this much of a problem with our Land & Sky waveless mattress. Their mattress stop holding the patch from a 'curious cat'. Unfortunately they went out of business.
customer_reviews.author: Danusmom48

customer_reviews.title: as advertised
customer_reviews.text: fit old waterbed frame perfectly doesn't come with filler kit
customer_reviews.author: Bernie Mitchell

product_meta.title: INNOMAX Genesis 700 Semi Waveless Lumbar Support Waterbed Mattress, Queen
product_meta.description: The innomax g700 genesis semi wave less lumbar support waterbed mattress substantially reduces motion to provide custom tailored hydrodynamic sleep, resulting in virtually perfect ear to ankle body alignment as defined by physicians and chiropractors for the ideal sleeping posture. this deep fill innomax waterbed mattress, for use with minimum 9x60x84" rigid box or wood waterbed frames, performs best when fill level is below the top of the safety liner. the g700 waterbed mattress, which provides true innomax sg1 full depth flotation and semi wave less performance, is additionally enhanced with mid body support. other features include; 22 mil premium vinyl, contouring body profile low tension sleep surface, 2" double reinforced corners, 4-way tethered support system, recessed l-seam construction and a thermally efficient black bottom. the sg1 (specific gravity 1) low tension mattress (ltm) surface features responsive levels of support for your body's varied levels of need; for the hea.
feature_bullets: Genesis 700 Semi Wave less Deep Fill Queen Waterbed Mattress for full depth rigid side box frame Semi Wave less Performance and 20 year warranty
Enhanced Wave Reduction featuring Semi Wave less Performance and gravity neutral fluid suspension mid-body support system
Multi-Layer wave elimination system and 22 mil premium paralyzed vinyl Body Profile sleep surface generously overcut Low Tension Mattress design
4 Way tethered support system for Integrated Internal Component Stabilization and recessed black bottom L Seam construction
Use with approved Waterbed Heater Waterbed Safety Liner Waterbed Water and Vinyl Conditioner Do Not Fill above Safety Liner

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars28 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
